DataElement.preferredName: Study Protocol Case Report Form Error Added Performed Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator that asks whether a case report form was added in error.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Study Protocol Case Report Form Error Added Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to a case report form (a document designed to record clinical study required information reported to the sponsor on each trial subject) being added (joining or combining or uniting with others) in error (a discrepancy between a condition and the specified correct value or condition) to a study protocol (the formal plan of an experiment or research activity).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The formal plan of an experiment or research activity, including the objective, rationale, design, materials and methods for the conduct of the study; intervention description, and method of data analysis.

Concepts.definition: The formal plan of an experiment or research activity, including the objective, rationale, design, materials and methods for the conduct of the study; intervention description, and method of data analysis.

Property.preferredName: Case Report Form Error Add Performed
Property.preferredDefinition: A printed, optical, or electronic document designed to record all of the clinical study-required information stipulated in the protocol to be reported to the sponsor on each trial subject.:A discrepancy between a computed, observed, or measured value or condition and the true, specified, or theoretically correct value or condition.:The act of joining or combining or uniting with others; increasing the quality, quantity, size or scope of.:Performed; carried out.

Concepts.definition: A printed, optical, or electronic document designed to record all of the clinical study-required information stipulated in the protocol to be reported to the sponsor on each clinical trial subject.
A discrepancy between a computed, observed, or measured value or condition and the true, specified, or theoretically correct value or condition.
To join or unite with others so as to increase size, quantity, or scope.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

DataElement.origin: CALGB CRF:Cancer and Leukemia Group B Case Report Form
